title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Ivanivka, Stepova Novoselivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conduc...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Ivanivka, Stepova Novoselivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Kupyansk, Sadove, Tabayivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
